entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -28.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -34.7°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
